title: Pixel 4 Crashing
content:
Since the latest update my Pixel 4 keeps randomly freezing/crashing. I could be using apps like Google Maps or just swapping between screens/apps then it would randomly freeze/crash and reboot. I don't know why but it's so frequent now I'm having several reboots a day.

Anyone else having this same issue? When is google going to release a fix for this?
